alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 01 at 2:14PM MDT until April 01 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 55 to 65 mph. Gusts 60 to 75 mph possible in the Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHERE...Natrona County Lower Elevations and Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk for lightweight and high-profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest wind gusts are likely to occur along Wyoming Boulevard on the south side of Casper
info.instruction: Use caution if driving. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
